name: Sunshine Make Happy (Bristol Pride Game Jam)
name_original: Sunshine Make Happy (Bristol Pride Game Jam)
description:
Go gentle, I coded a lot of this on a train.

Luke Merrett's entry for Bristol Pride Game Jam 2018, a simple arcade game along the theme of "sunshine".

The aim is to make the people happy as fast as possible by shining the sun on them whilst avoiding the clouds.
